name: FrogBall (Orbit Games, lila, L3mmy)
description:
A lot of research about frogs was put into this jam, what they eat, what they do, what is the best way to pet a frog, ect...

Through all the researches, we found out something, being a frog is tiring, we concluded that they must have, like humans, a sport they like to do once they're done being observed by humans and other stuff...

We bring you Frogball, a typical football match between 2 frogs! You can play it with 2 people locally or solo if you want to!

Great programming by Cassie

Cool art from L3mmy

Astonishing sound design and soundtrack by Lila

Game made for  Mini Jam 79 : Frogs
